auth.email_not_confirmed: Please confirm your email address before logging in.
auth.resend_confirmation_message: We'll send a new confirmation link to {{email}}
auth.resend_confirmation_success: A new confirmation link has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox.
auth.confirmation_sent: Confirmation email has been sent. Please check your inbox
auth.password_reset_instructions_sent: If the email exists in our system, you will receive password reset instructions shortly.
auth.password_reset_error: Unable to process password reset request. Please try again later.

mfa.setup_instructions: Please scan the QR code with your authenticator app
mfa.scan_qr_prompt: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (e.g., Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator)
mfa.enter_code_prompt: Enter the code from your authenticator app
mfa.invalid_code: Invalid code (maybe it has already expired)
mfa.setup_error_message: Error while setting up two-factor authentication. Please try again.
mfa.verification_error: Invalid verification code. Please try again.
